text: Leslie Carter (June 6, 1986 â€“ January 31, 2012) was an American pop singer. She is a sister to Nick Carter and Aaron Carter. ==Career== Carter signed a deal with DreamWorks Records in 1999. ==Death== Carter died of a drug overdose in January 2012. She was buried at New York. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American child singers Category:American pop singers Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States Category:Singers from Tampa, Florida
title: Leslie Carter
